message: Let's end this quickly Bob.  Take this offer and we can both enjoy our earnings!
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer gives us a more even split. Take it or lose out to inflation!
Bob, time is money!  This is my final offer.  Don't let inflation eat away at your potential gains any further.
Alice, this is ridiculous.  I'm offering a fair 50/50 split.  Accept it before inflation hurts us both even more.
